title: Google\Cloud\Orchestration\Airflow\Service\V1\DatabaseConfig
name: DatabaseConfig
description:
The configuration of Cloud SQL instance that is used by the Apache Airflow software.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.orchestration.airflow.service.v1.DatabaseConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.machine_type
params.description: Optional. Cloud SQL machine type used by Airflow database. It has to be one of: db-n1-standard-2, db-n1-standard-4, db-n1-standard-8 or db-n1-standard-16. If not specified, db-n1-standard-2 will be used. Supported for Cloud Composer environments in versions composer-1..-airflow-..*.

methods.name: getMachineType
methods.description:
Optional. Cloud SQL machine type used by Airflow database.

It has to be one of: db-n1-standard-2, db-n1-standard-4, db-n1-standard-8 or db-n1-standard-16. If not specified, db-n1-standard-2 will be used. Supported for Cloud Composer environments in versions composer-1..-airflow-..*.

Generated from protobuf field string machine_type = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];

methods.name: setMachineType
methods.description:
